title: Studio 8: At This Rate Awareness Campaign Typeface Inquiry
content:
I was wondering what the typeface was for the ’At This Rate’ booklet Studio 8 were responsible for?

I’ve attached a sample and you can also view the project at both their website and the Magma bookstore.

[http://www.studio8design.co.uk/client4.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085515/http:/www.studio8design.co.uk/client4.htm "http://www.studio8design.co.uk/client4.htm")  
 [http://www.magmabooks.com/content/bookshop/book.asp?disp=0&id=4835&page=...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085515/http:/www.magmabooks.com/content/bookshop/book.asp?disp=0&id=4835&page=1&c=GRA&sc=86 "http://www.magmabooks.com/content/bookshop/book.asp?disp=0&id=4835&page=1&c=GRA&sc=86")

I’d very much appreciate a response, thank you.

- Alyssa

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [4835.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085515/http:/typophile.com/files/4835.jpg) | 46.5 KB |

 [‹ Norditalia font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085515/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45460 "Go to previous forum topic") [help IDing this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085515/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45457 "Go to next forum topic")
author: AlyssaBarnes

comments.content:
It’s Avant Garde Gothic with Alternates:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/avant-garde-gothic-alternates-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085515/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/avant-garde-gothic-alternates-are-back/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/avant-garde-gothic-alternates-are-back/")
